extendedInfo.description: Build the greatest candy factory of all time! We have sweets for everyone!* PLAY OFFLINE! No internet connection required* 2 FREE Funny Mini games to enjoy!* BUILD up from a tiny tower to the biggest candy mountain!* DAILY FREE GIFTS to send to your friends & family! * UNLOCK tastier and more complex recipes as you level up! Keep on Playing* BUILD and discover your own Sweet shop full of delicious Candy treats.* EXPLORE, Expand and Decorate your favorite Candy Store the way you want it!Create a candy empire based on your imagination!â¥â¥â¥ DOWNLOAD  NOW 4 FREE! â¥â¥â¥Features:â¥ Connect with your friends in the gameâ¥ Fall in love with Candy Islandâs inhabitants!â¥ Care for your adorable helpers and customersâ¥ Decorate with 80+ beautiful decorationsâ¥ Decorate explore & share your factories with cute seasonal accessories.â¥ Share pictures of your Candy kingdom full of sweets and earn charms for having fun!â¥ Complete tasks & keep your candy shop full of treat!Reviews:Candy Island, the best app for kids! My kids enjoy it! Fun Educational puzzle App that keeps my toddler's busy for hours!Awesome & affordable app that teaches children to be patient, Candy will be ready in-time love itââ¥â¥â¥ 50+  Different Candy levels and factories to rebuild! â¥â¥â¥Sweets: Candy lovers beware, you won't be able to resist the sweet treats we have for you in our sweet shop!- lollipop- Licorice- Gummy fruit- Gummy snakes- Lollies- Bubblegum Factory- Snowie Sweets- Gummy bears- Marshmellows- DropsCakes: Bake Decorate and discover, delicious recipes like:- Muffins- Cookies- Donuts- Pancakes- Gingerbread hearts- Waffels- Apple Pie- Cupcakes- Chocolate CroissantsCandy: Unlock many different candy recipes for your factory.ChocolatesPralinesChocolate & Sweets Maker! Your taste buds will force you to the nearest candy saloon or bakery store!- Cotton- Gummy Fish- Candy corn- Jellyfish- Fudge- Caramel fudgeDrinks: Be the Maker and builder of all candy kingdoms!- Milkshake - Hot chocolate Fruits and vegetables:- Apple- Strawberries- Hazelnut Cream- MushroomsBe the best dessert maker! Feed all of the lovely zoo animal villagers  yummy desserts and make them love you!- Pudding- Ice cream- Ice popsDescription: The story of Candy Island takes place in a happy and enchanted world, inhabited by a zoo of adorable cute little monsters living on the tasty candy farm. Cute beanie workers care for their sweet pet villagers by making cake and ice cream to spread joy and happiness.Candy Island is an endless fun addictive entertaining candy game for girls and boys, young and old. Candy Island is filled with awesome visual treats and candy accessories to decorate your factories.Create delicious, candy , dessert, fruit and vegetable.Cand Island is a smart app for kids,fun, educational and best for your kids!Fall in love with candy village music, it will make you feel like a prince or princess in your very own candy castle. Create yummy desserts, chocolate and ice cream factories, draw trendsetting happy customers in from everywhere to buy your sweet delicious candy. The evil Dr Zog has destroyed every bakery store, chocolate factory and tiny sugar tower in Candy Island.Come on lets get all our friends and family together to hunt for the lost recipes, before school starts, during break time and before we go to bedtime, we need to help the villagersâ¥â¥ TRY NOW FOR FREE! â¥â¥Your cute little Beanie helpers need you!ââ PLAY CANDY ISLAND NOW! ââ

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is a highly addictive game. Theres a couple of minor gliches but overall fun to play. If you had more gifts to send to friends it would be even better
reviews.author: Linda Mason

reviews.title: I love cotton candy
reviews.comment: This game is soooo awesome I love it.I love cotton candy so this game is more fun with cotton candy.
reviews.author: Katie Lofaro

reviews.title: Its a great game with a few flaws...
reviews.comment: I really like this game its really fun to play, but the only thing I don\'t like is wen you make a profile an change your phone you can\'t go back an get ur game bck you have to start all over again. An the advertising\'s for other games that keep poping up is a pain in the butt as well, but imma still give them 5 stars hoping they improve the things I just spoke about....
reviews.author: Lisa Kirkland

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: This is a game for having fun making and selling sweets! Its offline so you can play anytime. I haven\'t had a problem with this game. It loads fast and its easy! Enjoy playing!
reviews.author: Stephanie Ohlinger

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Have to play two games to get help.  Facebook doesnt always update, cant take pictures and post so I dont get charms.
reviews.author: krystal powell

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It kind of gets boring after about 10 minutes. You can only send 3 gifts a day and can\'t do anything when you travel to your friends island. So really what\'s the point of more than 3 friends? It passes time.
reviews.author: Rebecca Flanagan

reviews.title: A fun game a lot to do once you get going
reviews.comment: Love the game

reviews.title: Love it !!!!
reviews.comment: Be prepared to not want to put it down !!!

reviews.comment: Sweet and addictive. Just what a candy island should be.
